statements: DELETE FROM log_files WHERE algorithm_name = 'Compression Algorithm' AND log_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM log_files WHERE algorithm_name = 'Sorting' AND log_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM error_messages WHERE error_type = 'critical' AND error_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM error_messages WHERE error_code = 404 AND message LIKE '%not found%';
DELETE FROM log_files WHERE id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-06-01';
DELETE FROM performance_monitoring WHERE cpu_usage > 50.00 AND memory_usage < 100.00;
DELETE FROM error_messages WHERE error_code = 404 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
